    #include <iostream>
    #include <cstdlib>
    #include <math.h>
    using namespace std;
    inline double remainder(int n)
    {
    int sum=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
    sum+=(n%10);
    n/=10;
    }
    return sum;
    }
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    long long int req=(n*pow(2,remainder(n)));
    cout<<req<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
